name: Fishing Simulator 2022
description:
I made this game in 3 days to learn the GODOT engine. Truthfully, I just uploaded this to say "I did it!".

You are a very hungry seal. You have driven your boat into the seas to fish for your dinner.

How To Play:

There's only one input you need and it's your mouse!

When the "!" appears click the screen as fast as you can to catch the fish.
